lec6.subtitle: ุชูููู ุงููุตูุต ูุชุฑููุจูุง ุฒู ุงููุญุชุฑู
lec6.code:

lec6.code:

lec6.title: Nested List (ููุงุฆู ุฏุงุฎู ููุงุฆู) + ุนูููุงุช ูููุฉ
lec6.subtitle: ุชูุซูู ุงูุฌุฏุงูู ูุงููุตูููุงุช ุจุจุณุงุทุฉ
lec6.code:
# ูุตูููุฉ 3x3
matrix = [
    [1, 2, 3],
    [4, 5, 6],
    [7, 8, 9]
]

print(matrix[1][2])         # 6
matrix[1][1] = 50           # ุชุนุฏูู
print(matrix[1])            # [4, 50, 6]

# ูุฌููุน ูู ุตู  ู ูู ุงูุงูุซูุฉ ุงููู ุฌุงูู ูุณู ูุชูููููุง ููุง ุชุงุฎุฏูุง ููุถูุน ุงูุชูุฑุงุฑ
row_sums = [sum(row) for row in matrix]
print(row_sums)             # [6, 60, 24]

# ูุฌููุน ุนููุฏ (ุงูุนููุฏ 0)
col0_sum = sum(row[0] for row in matrix)
print(col0_sum)             # 1 + 4 + 7 = 12

# ุชูุฑูุบ ููุงุฆูุฉ ูุงุญุฏุฉ
flat = [item for row in matrix for item in row]
print(flat)                 # [1, 2, 3, 4, 50, 6, 7, 8, 9]

# ุฅูุดุงุก ูุตูููุฉ ุขููุฉ ูู ุงูุฃุตูุงุฑ 3x3
safe = [[0 for _ in range(3)] for _ in range(3)]
safe[0][0] = 99
print(safe)                 # ุงูุตู ุงูุฃูู ููุท ูุชุบููุฑ

lec6.title: ูุดุฑูุน 1: ุงูุฃุฑูุจ ูู ุงูุญุฏููุฉ
lec6.subtitle: ุชุญุฏูุซ Nested List ุจูุงุกู ุนูู ุฅุฏุฎุงู ุงููุณุชุฎุฏู
lec6.code:
# ุฅูุดุงุก ุงูุญุฏููุฉ 3x3
garden = [
    ["๐ฟ", "๐ฟ", "๐ฟ"],
    ["๐ฟ", "๐ฟ", "๐ฟ"],
    ["๐ฟ", "๐ฟ", "๐ฟ"]
]

print("\n๐: Please, I am hungry! Can you help me find food?\n")

# ุนุฑุถ ุงูุญุฏููุฉ ุงูุฃูููุฉ
print(' '.join(garden[0]))
print(' '.join(garden[1]))

# ุฅุฏุฎุงู ุงููููุน ูู ุงููุณุชุฎุฏู
row = int(input("\nEnter row (1-3): ")) - 1
col = int(input("Enter column (1-3): ")) - 1

# ูุถุน ุงูุฃุฑูุจ ูู ุงูููุงู ุงููุทููุจ
garden[row][col] = "๐"

# ุนุฑุถ ุงูุญุฏููุฉ ุจุนุฏ ุงูุชุญุฏูุซ
print()
print(' '.join(garden[0]))
print(' '.join(garden[1]))
print(' '.join(garden[2]))

print("\n๐: Thanks for the food! โค๏ธ")

lec7.title: Tuple (ุงูุตููู ุงูุซุงุจุชุฉ) ูู ุจุงูุซูู
lec7.subtitle: ุฅูุชู ุฃุณุชุฎุฏู ุจูุงูุงุช ุซุงุจุชุฉ ูููู ูููุฉ
lec7.code:
# ุฅูุดุงุก Tuple
colors = ("red", "green", "blue")
print(colors[0])      # red
print(colors[-1])     # blue
print(colors[0:2])    # ('red', 'green')

# ุชูููู ุงูุนูุงุตุฑ (Unpacking)
point = (10, 20)
x, y = point
print(x, y)           # 10 20

# ูุญุงููุฉ ุชุนุฏูู ุนูุตุฑ (ุณูุคุฏู ูุฎุทุฃ)
# colors[1] = "yellow"  # TypeError: 'tuple' object does not support item assignment

# ุงูุชุญููู ุจูู List ู Tuple
nums_list = [1, 2, 3]
nums_tuple = tuple(nums_list)
back_to_list = list(nums_tuple)
print(nums_tuple)     # (1, 2, 3)

lec7.title: ุงููุฑู ุจูู Module ู Library ู Framework
lec7.subtitle: ููู ููููุงุช ูุฃุฏูุงุช ุงูุจุฑูุฌุฉ ูู ุจุงูุซูู
lec7.code:
# ูุซุงู ุนูู Module
import math
print(math.sqrt(16))  # ูู module math

# ูุซุงู ุนูู Library
import random  # ุฌุฒุก ูู ููุชุจุฉ ุงูุจุงูุซูู ุงูููุงุณูุฉ

# ูุซุงู ุนูู Framework (ูุงุฒู ูุดุฑูุน ูุงูู)
# from django.http import HttpResponse
lec7.notes:
- Module = ููู .py ููู ุฃููุงุฏ.
- Library = ูุฌููุนุฉ Modules.
- Framework = ุจูุญุฏุฏ ุงููููู ูุทุฑููุฉ ุงูุนูู.
- ูุด ูู Library Frameworkุ ููู ูู Framework ูุญุชูู ุนูู ููุชุจุงุช ูModules.

question.text: ูุง ุงููุฑู ุงูุฃุณุงุณู ุจูู Library ู Frameworkุ

lec7.title: ูุดุฑูุน ุชุทุจููู: ูููุฏ ูููุงุช ุงููุฑูุฑ ุงูุนุดูุงุฆูุฉ
lec7.subtitle: ุชุฌููุน ุงูููุงุฆู ูุนูููุงุชูุง ูุน random ู string
lec7.code:
import random
import string

# --- 1. Enter password settings ---
length = int(input("Enter the desired password length: "))

include_digits = input("Include digits? (y/n): ").lower() == 'y'
include_lower = input("Include lowercase letters? (y/n): ").lower() == 'y'
include_upper = input("Include uppercase letters? (y/n): ").lower() == 'y'
include_symbols = input("Include punctuation symbols? (y/n): ").lower() == 'y'

# --- 2. Create a list of possible characters ---
chars = ''

if include_digits:
    chars += string.digits

if include_lower:
    chars += string.ascii_lowercase

if include_upper:
    chars += string.ascii_uppercase

if include_symbols:
    chars += string.punctuation

# --- 3. Check that the characters string is not empty ---
if not chars:
    print("โ You must select at least one type of characters!")
else:
    # --- 4. Generate the password without loops ---
    password = ''.join(random.choices(chars, k=length))
    print(f"\n๐ Your random password: {password}")

lec10.title: Project: Contact Management System
lec10.subtitle: ุฅุฏุงุฑุฉ ุฌูุงุช ุงูุงุชุตุงู ุจุงุณุชุฎุฏุงู Dictionary
lec10.code:
#imports
import os
import time

# functions

def options():
    print("""
    1- Add
    2- View
    3- Edit
    4- exit
        """)
    option=int(input("please Enter a number for your option: "))
    return option


def AddContact():
    id=input("Enter person ID like (001): ")
    name=input("Enter person name: ")
    phone=input("Enter person phone: ")
    contacts[id]={"name":name,"phone":phone}
    print("ok, We Added sucssefully")


def view():
    for x in contacts:
        print(f"ID: {x}")
        print(f"Name: {contacts[x]['name']}")
        print(f"Phone: {contacts[x]['phone']}")
        print("--------------------------- \n")


def Edit():
    id=input("Enter person ID : ")
    if id in contacts:
        name=input("Enter New name: ")
        phone=input("Enter New phone: ")
        contacts[id]={"name":name,"phone":phone}
        print(f"ok, We Edit {id} sucssefully")
    else:
        print("this id doesn't exist in contacts")


#########

# start

contacts={}
option=True

while option:
    print("** Welcome in Contact Management **\n")
    option=options()
    if option == 1:
        AddContact()
    elif option == 2:
        view()
    elif option == 3:
        Edit()
    elif option == 4:
        option = False
    else:
        print("please Enter a vaild option : ")

    time.sleep(5)
    input("press Enter to continue...")
    os.system("cls")
lec10.output:

4- exit

please Enter a number for your option: 1
Enter person ID like (001): 001
Enter person name: Ahmed
Enter person phone: 01012345678
ok, We Added sucssefully

- ุงูุจุฑูุงูุฌ ุจูุนุชูุฏ ุนูู Dictionary ูุชุฎุฒูู ุงูุจูุงูุงุช.
- ูู Contact ุจูุชุฎุฒู ุจุงุณุชุฎุฏุงู ID ูููุชุงุญ.
- ุงูููู ุนุจุงุฑุฉ ุนู Dictionary ูููุง (name, phone).
- ุจูุณุชุฎุฏู os.system('cls') ููุณุญ ุงูุดุงุดุฉ (Windows).

lec1.code:
# ูุซุงู OOP (Object-Oriented Programming)

class Student:
    def __init__(self, name, age, grade):
        self.name = name
        self.age = age
        self.grade = grade

    def print_student(self):
        print(f"Name: {self.name}, Age: {self.age}, Grade: {self.grade}")

# ุฅูุดุงุก ูุงุฆู (Object) ูู ุงูููุงุณ Student
student1 = Student("Ali", 20, "A")

# ุงุณุชุฏุนุงุก ุงูููุซูุฏ ุงูุฎุงุตุฉ ุจุงููุงุฆู
student1.print_student()

        self.name = name   # Attribute
